channel.title: Misc on Sequr
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on Sequr

item.title: M0rsarchive
item.description: Write-up of the M0rsarchive misc challenge by swani on HackTheBox.eu. Just unzip the archive … several times …

item.title: Networked
item.description: Write-up of the Networked machine by guly on HackTheBox.eu.

item.title: Crooked Crockford
item.description: Write-up of the Crooked Crockford misc challenge by sx02089 on HackTheBox.eu. Some bits are missing.

item.title: Blackhole
item.description: Write-up of the Blackhole misc challenge by ice3man on HackTheBox.eu. A strange file has been discovered in Stephen Hawking’s computer.

item.title: Longbottomâ€™s Locker
item.description: Write-up of the Longbottom’s Locker misc challenge by felli0t on HackTheBox.eu. Break into Longbottom’s vault and steal his secrets.

item.title: Eternal Loop
item.description: Write-up of the Eternal Loop misc challenge by MinatoTW on HackTheBox.eu. Can you find a way out of this loop?

item.title: misDIRection
item.description: Write-up of the misDIRection misc challenge by incidrthreat on HackTheBox.eu. During an assessment of a unix system the HTB team found a suspicious directory.

item.title: Inferno
item.description: Write-up of the Inferno misc challenge by Untao on HackTheBox.eu. Find the flag.

item.title: Art
item.description: Write-up of the Art misc challenge by Hexp on HackTheBox.eu. Can you find the flag?

item.title: 0ld is g0ld
item.description: Write-up of the 0ld is g0ld misc challenge by subzer0x0 on HackTheBox.eu. Old algorithms are not a waste, but are really precious…

item.title: fs0ciety
item.description: Write-up of the fs0ciety misc challenge by subzer0x0 on HackTheBox.eu. Can you crack the ‘ZIP’ folder and get the SSH password?
